problem: Shooting hoops for 30 minutes burns 150 calories. How many calories would Kendra burn shooting hoops if she shot hoops 30 minutes every day for one week?
solution: Since Kendra burns 150 calories every time she shoots hoops for 30 minutes, and she does this activity 7 times during the week, the total calories burned are $150 \times 7 = \boxed{1050}$ calories.
